text: Fifteen more members of Hollywood ’ s elite have been chosen to present on Hollywood ’ s biggest night. Oscar producers Michael De Luca and Jennifer Todd announced Tuesday that Black Panther star Lupita Nyong ’ o has been added to the list of presenters taking the stage during Sunday night ’ s Oscars telecast. She ’ ll be joined by fellow stars Sandra Bullock, Jane Fonda, Emily Blunt, Dave Chappelle, Eugenio Derbez, Ansel Elgort, Jodie Foster, Eiza González, Ashley Judd, Nicole Kidman, Matthew McConaughey, Helen Mirren, Rita Moreno, and Christopher Walken. “ These actors have embodied some of the most heroic, aspirational and indelible characters ever brought to the screen, ” said De Luca
